author: Al Jazeera
title: COVID-19: Florida governor criticised for not acting sooner
description: Health experts say hospitals in Florida will be strained by the summer as the death toll rises.
content:
Statewide orders to stay at home throughout the United States are seen as pivotal in curbing the spread of the new coronavirus.
But Florida, which now has more than 15,000 cases, has been criticised for not implementing those measures sooner.
